2013-10-25 02:19:18

SQL: 		
			CREATE TABLE `sx_edu_knowledge_hx10` (
			  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
			  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
			  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
			  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
			  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
			  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
			  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
			  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
			  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
			  `match_flag` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:1',
			  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
			  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
			) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';
			SELECT 1;		
			CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `sx_edu_knowledge2question_hx10` (
			  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
			  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
			  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
			  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
			  KEY `chapter_id` (`knowledge_id`),
			  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
			) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';
			SELECT 1;

2014-01-12 08:17:25
SQL: 		
		SELECT t1.* , IFNULL(t3.member_count , 0) as member_count , t4.username FROM hx_user_group t1 
		JOIN (
				SELECT hx_user_group.ancestor_id,hx_user_group.id FROM hx_user 
			    JOIN hx_user_group ON hx_user.group_id=hx_user_group.id WHERE hx_user.id=1
		) t2 ON t1.ancestor_id LIKE IF(LENGTH(t2.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%')) 		
		LEFT JOIN (
			SELECT group_id , count(*) as member_count FROM hx_user GROUP BY group_id
		) t3 ON t1.id=t3.group_id  
	    LEFT JOIN hx_user t4 ON t1.creator_id=t4.id
		LIMIT 0,10 
		ORDER BY t1.ancestor_id ASC;

2014-01-12 08:21:36
SQL: 		
		SELECT t1.* , IFNULL(t3.member_count , 0) as member_count , t4.username FROM hx_user_group t1 
		JOIN (
				SELECT hx_user_group.ancestor_id,hx_user_group.id FROM hx_user 
			    JOIN hx_user_group ON hx_user.group_id=hx_user_group.id WHERE hx_user.id=1
		) t2 ON t1.ancestor_id LIKE IF(LENGTH(t2.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%')) 		
		LEFT JOIN (
			SELECT group_id , count(*) as member_count FROM hx_user GROUP BY group_id
		) t3 ON t1.id=t3.group_id  
	    LEFT JOIN hx_user t4 ON t1.creator_id=t4.id
		ORDER BY t1.ancestor_id ASC 
		LIMIT ,;
		
ErrorInfo: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '' at line 11

2014-01-12 08:21:36
SQL: 		
		SELECT t1.* , IFNULL(t3.member_count , 0) as member_count , t4.username  FROM hx_workset t1  
		JOIN (
				SELECT hx_workset.ancestor_id,hx_workset.id FROM hx_user 
			    JOIN hx_workset ON hx_user.workset_id=hx_workset.id WHERE hx_user.id=1
		) t2 ON t1.ancestor_id LIKE IF(LENGTH(t2.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%')) 	
	    LEFT JOIN (
			SELECT workset_id , count(*) as member_count FROM hx_user GROUP BY workset_id
		) t3 ON t1.id=t3.workset_id
		LEFT JOIN hx_user t4 ON t1.creator_id=t4.id 
		LIMIT ,;

2014-01-25 02:57:45
SQL: 		
		SELECT t1.* , IFNULL(t3.member_count , 0) as member_count , t4.username  FROM hx_workset t1  
		JOIN (
				SELECT hx_workset.ancestor_id,hx_workset.id,hx_workset.parent_id FROM hx_user 
			    JOIN hx_workset ON hx_user.workset_id=hx_workset.id WHERE hx_user.id=1
		) t2 ON t1.ancestor_id LIKE IF(t2.parent_id=0 , '%' , ENGTH(t2.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%')) 	
	    LEFT JOIN (
			SELECT workset_id , count(*) as member_count FROM hx_user GROUP BY workset_id
		) t3 ON t1.id=t3.workset_id
		LEFT JOIN hx_user t4 ON t1.creator_id=t4.id 
		LIMIT 0,10;
		
ErrorInfo: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%')) 	
	    LEFT J' at line 5

		) t2 ON t1.ancestor_id LIKE IF(t2.parent_id=0 , '%' , IF(LENGTH(t2.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%')))

		SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hx_workset t1

				SELECT hx_workset.ancestor_id,hx_workset.id FROM hx_user 
			    JOIN hx_workset ON hx_user.workset_id=hx_workset.id WHERE hx_user.id=1
		) t2 ON t1.ancestor_id LIKE IF(t2.parent_id=0 , '%' , IF(LENGTH(t2.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%')))

  `id` varchar(6) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `Name` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '-',
  `country_id` varchar(6) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=''
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/area_province';
  

CREATE TABLE `edu_subject` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `subject_code` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `subject_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `abbr` varchar(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 
COMMENT=''
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/edu_subject';


CREATE TABLE `edu_grade` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 112',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `code` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `grade_index` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,
  `display_flag` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 10',
  `section_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 
COMMENT=''
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/edu_grade';


CREATE TABLE `edu_section` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED

COMMENT=''

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)

CREATE TABLE `edu_question_type` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `subject_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `type_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `objective_flag` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:, 1:',
  `order_index` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=''
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/edu_question_type';



CREATE TABLE `edu_publisher` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `s_abbr` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,
  `pub_code` char(3) DEFAULT NULL,
  `pub_index` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` varchar(4000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' JSONcommon_image',
  `abbr` varchar(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=' '
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/edu_publisher';

CREATE TABLE `dl_edu_book` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '',
  `book_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `publisher_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `subject_id` char(2) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` char(2) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `book_code` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `cover_pic` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=''
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/dl_edu_book';

CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_chapter` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `chapter_name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `chapter_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `chapter_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `unit_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `knowledge_tag` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_chapter2question` (
	`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
	  `chapter_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  `question_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
	  KEY `chapter_id` (`chapter_id`),
	  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=68 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_unit` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_index` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `subject_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4033 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_knowledge` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `match_flag` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:1',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_knowledge2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `chapter_id` (`knowledge_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_zhuanti` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_list` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `cover_pic` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_zhuanti2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `zhuanti_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `knowledge_id` (`zhuanti_id`,`question_id`),
  KEY `chapter_id` (`zhuanti_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=54 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';



/**    */

CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `sx_edu_chapter` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `chapter_name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `chapter_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `chapter_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `unit_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `knowledge_tag` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `sx_edu_chapter2question` (
	`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
	  `chapter_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  `question_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
	  KEY `chapter_id` (`chapter_id`),
	  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=68 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',

  `grade_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)

	  KEY `chapter_id` (`chapter_id`),
	  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=68 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `sw_edu_unit` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_index` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `subject_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4033 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;

CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/edu_source_type';



CREATE TABLE `edu_question_type` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `subject_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `type_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `objective_flag` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:, 1:',
  `order_index` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=''
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/edu_question_type';



CREATE TABLE `edu_publisher` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `s_abbr` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,
  `pub_code` char(3) DEFAULT NULL,
  `pub_index` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` varchar(4000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' JSONcommon_image',
  `abbr` varchar(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=' '
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/edu_publisher';



CREATE TABLE `edu_year` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `year` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=' '
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/edu_year';



CREATE TABLE `dl_edu_book` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '',
  `book_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `publisher_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `subject_id` char(2) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` char(2) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `book_code` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `cover_pic` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=''
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/dl_edu_book';

  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',

/**    */

CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_chapter` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `chapter_name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `chapter_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `chapter_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `unit_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `knowledge_tag` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_chapter2question` (
	`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
	  `chapter_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  `question_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
	  KEY `chapter_id` (`chapter_id`),
	  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=68 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_unit` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_index` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `subject_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4033 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_knowledge` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `match_flag` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:1',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_knowledge2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `chapter_id` (`knowledge_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_zhuanti` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_list` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `cover_pic` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_zhuanti2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `zhuanti_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `knowledge_id` (`zhuanti_id`,`question_id`),
  KEY `chapter_id` (`zhuanti_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=54 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',

  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',

  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',

  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yy_edu_knowledge2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',

  KEY `chapter_id` (`knowledge_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)

  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',

  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `zz_edu_zhuanti` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_list` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `cover_pic` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `zz_edu_zhuanti2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `zhuanti_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `knowledge_id` (`zhuanti_id`,`question_id`),
  KEY `chapter_id` (`zhuanti_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=54 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';



/**    */

CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `dl_edu_chapter` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `chapter_name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `chapter_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `chapter_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `unit_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `knowledge_tag` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `dl_edu_chapter2question` (
	`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
	  `chapter_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  `question_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
	  KEY `chapter_id` (`chapter_id`),
	  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=68 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `dl_edu_unit` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_index` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `subject_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4033 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `dl_edu_knowledge` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `match_flag` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:1',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `dl_edu_knowledge2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `chapter_id` (`knowledge_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

  `chapter_name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `chapter_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `chapter_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `unit_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `knowledge_tag` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,

  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

  `grade_id` char(2) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `book_code` char(2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `cover_pic` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) 
ENGINE=FEDERATED 
DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
COMMENT=''
CONNECTION='mysql://root:123456@localhost/hx_curriculumn/ls_edu_book';   



/**    */

CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_chapter` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `chapter_name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `chapter_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `chapter_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `unit_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `knowledge_tag` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_chapter2question` (
	`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
	  `chapter_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  `question_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
	  KEY `chapter_id` (`chapter_id`),
	  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=68 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_unit` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_index` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `subject_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4033 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `yw_edu_knowledge` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `match_flag` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:1',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

  `chapter_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `unit_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `knowledge_tag` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `hx_edu_chapter2question` (
	`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
	  `chapter_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  `question_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
	  KEY `chapter_id` (`chapter_id`),
	  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=68 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `chapter_name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  `chapter_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `chapter_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `book_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `unit_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `knowledge_tag` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `ti_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` longtext COLLATE utf8_bin COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `pub_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `subject_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `ls_edu_chapter2question` (
	`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
	  `chapter_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  `question_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
	  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
	  KEY `chapter_id` (`chapter_id`),
	  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=68 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';


CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `ls_edu_unit` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pub_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `book_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_code` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `unit_index` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `subject_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `grade_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `section_id` char(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ID',
  `source` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `flagid` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visible` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT ':01',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4033 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ls_edu_knowledge` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `match_flag` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:1',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ls_edu_knowledge2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `knowledge_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `chapter_id` (`knowledge_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ls_edu_zhuanti` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT ' 12',
  `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT ' ',
  `subject_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `grade_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sort_id` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `section_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_id` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `knowledge_list` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `version_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `cover_pic` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1208 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ls_edu_zhuanti2question` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `zhuanti_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  `question_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `knowledge_id` (`zhuanti_id`,`question_id`),
  KEY `chapter_id` (`zhuanti_id`),
  KEY `qid` (`question_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=54 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='';

			 SELECT setin_exam.id , exam_name ,exam_code , IFNULL(edu_source.source , concat(setin_exam.source,'_missing')) as source ,
			 IFNULL(exam_finish , 0) as exam_finish , IFNULL(tongbu_finish , 0) as tongbu_finish , IFNULL(zhuanti_finish , 0) as zhuanti_finish   
			 FROM setin_exam 
			 LEFT JOIN edu_source ON setin_exam.source=edu_source.source_code 
			 LEFT JOIN setin_exam_complete ON setin_exam.id=setin_exam_complete.setin_exam_id

SQL: 		
		SELECT t1.* , IFNULL(t3.member_count , 0) as member_count , t4.username FROM hx_user_group t1 
		JOIN (
				SELECT hx_user_group.ancestor_id,hx_user_group.id,hx_user_group.parent_id FROM hx_user 
			    JOIN hx_user_group ON hx_user.group_id=hx_user_group.id WHERE hx_user.id=1
		) t2 ON t1.ancestor_id LIKE IF(t2.parent_id=0 , '%' , IF(LENGTH(t2.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t2.ancestor_id ,'_' , t2.id , '%') , concat(t2.id , '%'))) 		
		LEFT JOIN (
			SELECT group_id , count(*) as member_count FROM hx_user GROUP BY group_id
		) t3 ON t1.id=t3.group_id  
	    LEFT JOIN hx_user t4 ON t1.creator_id=t4.id
		ORDER BY t1.ancestor_id ASC 
		LIMIT NaN,10;

				JOIN (
					SELECT hx_workset.ancestor_id,hx_worset.id FROM hx_user 
				    JOIN hx_workset ON hx_user.workset_id=hx_workset.id WHERE hx_user.id=1) t3 
	    		ON t2.ancestor_id LIKE IF(LENGTH(t3.ancestor_id)>0 , concat(t3.ancestor_id ,'_' , t3.id , '%') , concat(t3.id,'%'))

SQL: 		
		SELECT t1.* ,
		t5.username ,	t4.name as type_name , t2.name as action_name , t3.name as entity , 
		t1.note , t1.old_value , t1.new_value , t6.book_name as entity_name
		FROM base_version_history t1
		JOIN base_history_action t2 ON t1.action_id=t2.id
		JOIN edu_entity_type t3 ON t1.entity_type=t3.id
		JOIN edu_source_type t4 ON t1.source_type=t4.id
		JOIN hx_curriculumn.hx_user t5 ON t1.user_id=t5.id
		JOIN edu_total_book t6 ON t1.element_id=t6.id AND t1.entity_type=10 
		WHERE t1.action_id IN (1,5) AND t1.source_type=1;
